name: Builds for all architectures should work now.
Move to Github Actions
body: Added a new bucket hydrology component and moved CI to Github actions

name: Drop Mac builds for now
body: Timeouts on Mac builds are preventing other deployments

name: Fix formatting errors
body: changes to the PyPI system requires properly formatted `long_description`

name: Bug fix and enhancements for RRTMG
body: Fix bugs in McICA component and add new random number generation logic.

name: Update dependency
body: numpy 1.15.2 was no longer working, numpy 1.16.0 is needed.

name: Fix mac wheel build
body: use correct xcode image for travis

name: Bug fixes and documentation
body:
Some documentation and bug fixes.

@suhasdl, @SallyDa and @JoyMonteiro  contributed to this release.

name: New features, refactor init
body:
* RRTMG now supports MCICA. 
* The initialisation code has been refactored, to eventually become more flexible
* CI on Mac is now again active.

name: Zenodo DOI release
body:
Zenodo was down and therefore did not generate a DOI for the latest release. No code changes are present
in this release.

name: Bug fix release
body: We are trying to fix install issues with Windows.

name: Don't support 3.7 yet
body: Just a patch release to prevent building py37 binaries.

name: Major Refactor
body: This release brings climt up-to-date with the sympl 0.4.0 API. It also streamlines much of the internal code and the default state generation API.

name: Fix issue with tarball not being complete.
Fix issue with release on py27 linux
For GMD
body: Zenodo does not register releases done via tags yet.
